title: Stunning 17th-Century Château Stay in the Heart of Medieval Bastide Villages
description: Treat yourself to a quintessentially French experience with a stay at Château de l’Hoste, a 17th-century château in the quaint hamlet of Saint-Beauzeil. The area is known for its exceptional local wines and beautiful, rural countryside. Included in your stay is daily breakfast, one three-course dinner for two, a wine tasting and more.
